patterns: how much the course fee is?
responses: fee is very low
you want it free? here you go!!!
We don't take any fees
We don't take any fees, we are private charitable org!!!

CHARUSAT proudly follows this spirit. It also follows founding High Moral Values like Honesty, Integrity, Transparency, Fairness, Equity, and Accountability.

CHARUSAT offers various programs, viz., UG, PG, Doctoral, Post-Doctoral, Diploma, Value-added and Executive Development Programs under the tutelage of 9 Institutes, 6 Faculties, and various Centers / Cells. An employee strength of 600, student strength of more than 8000 and a Capital Outlay of INR 150 Crores are the scalar dimensions of CHARUSAT. The programs are offered in the allied disciplines of Technology & Engineering, Pharmacy, Computer Applications, Management Studies, Applied Sciences, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and other Paramedical Sciences.

CHARUSAT is located at Off. Nadiad-Petlad Highway, Changa 388 421,Anand, Gujarat, INDIA.

There are total 8 departments in CHARUSAT University.

responses: Yes , CHARUSAT campus has 4 Girls hostels and Outside Campus Boys hostel is also there. You can check it out more here: https://www.charusat.ac.in/hostels.php

patterns: Which branch for Engineering in DEPSTAR?
list of courses available in depstar
responses: Total 3 branch: Information Technology(IT) ,Computer Science & Engineering(CSE) and Computer Engineering(CE).

patterns: By whome depstar is being managed?
responses: The institute is managed through a think tank of technocrats, administrators, scientists and engineers, educationalists, businessmen, stakeholders and other well-wishers from all parts of the world.

patterns: who is the hod of depstar
responses: Dr. Amit Ganatra is Head of Department of DEPSTAR.

patterns: By whome CSPIT is being managed?

patterns: How is placement in Charusat University
responses: CHARUSAT provides excellent placemts opportunities. More than 20 companies come for on-campus placement, like jaro education, BYJU'S, Berger, adani, Jeavio, TVTV, Samsung, Crest Data Systems etc., you can read more here: https://www.charusat.ac.in/placement.php

patterns: Is there any festival celebrated in this college
responses: We at CHARUSAT celebrate festivals and days very enthusiastically. You can follow our social media page as well. There are many festival celebrating like Vrund , cognizance, spoural etc., https://www.instagram.com/thecharusat/
